title: Pathos Nethack codex v3.2 [apkpita]
description:
Pathos is a roguelike adventure game inspired by the rule set from Nethack. Choose from 13 classes and journey deep into the dungeon. Descend to hell to defeat your nemesis before escaping the dungeon with all the loot you can carry!

Take your hero through a twisted underground maze. Avoid tricky traps, underground monsters and other dangers on your way. Go to find treasure in this Android game. You are going to visit many dungeons where the death will be waiting for the character at every step. Take your character forward very carefully and consider each step of yours. Apply unique skills of each hero to defeat monsters or escape from them. Use magic potions and other things you will find. Overcome all obstacles and get home with a take.

Game features:
13 classes of characters
Retro style graphics
Various munitions
Step-by-step gameplay

Whatâ€™s new:
- see the full change log in help > updates
- swipe from the left edge to save & quit
- designed for tablets & phones in landscape or portrait mode
- auto save on change level
- resurrect and continue
- custom characters
- overland quest or dungeon adventure
- ride your steed into battle
- choose from absurd, classic and geoduck tiles
- 200+ extra monsters from Slash'em
- comprehensive help
- hall of fame by role (top 20)
- turn-based and real-time modes
- French and Chinese translations

Requirements: Android OS 4.0.3 and up
